ygData.subject: Re: Description Thingy
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Bah, I don t care what kind of armor you are wearing or weapon you are wielding...no one looks cooler when they are just standing around then a bard
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Fun Bob" <fun-bob@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] Description Thingy
>Date: Thu, 20 May 1999 12:27:42 -0400
>
>From: "Fun Bob" <fun-bob@...>
>
>Yes, I have also seen it playing with options or something like that, but I
>really havent wanted to enter a descrition, as I dont look cool enough for
>someone to check me out.

Bah, I don't care what kind of armor you are wearing or weapon you are
wielding...no one looks cooler when they are just standing around then a
bard strumming on a mandolin =)

Now strumming on a stick/flute that is suppose to be a drum is a different
story...A little conga drum with your character model beating on it would be
very nice.

Sartori of Kelethin
